Transmit
Announcements
Transmit is a group of audio wizards coming to you loudly & proudly from Washington, DC. We specialize in mixing & mastering albums, editing audio, writing original music, & just about anything else that makes noise.

Mixing & Mastering

Mixing is our *~favorite~*. There's just something special about taking the bones of a song and creating something newly beautiful. We've got years of experience mixing in all sorts of genres; we can handle it.

Here are a few projects we've mixed/mastered in the past that we're especially proud of:

  • Wool Tunnel

    by Hue

  • Boys Again

    by Hue

  • I Still See You

    by Blake Sweetland

  • EP2

    by WAYSoF

  • Claws

    by Blake Sweetland

  • Person, Place, or Thing

    by WAYSoF

  • Archer's Jamboree

    by Houdan The Mystic

  • Sea Prism

    by Phantoms

Podcasts
